data.title: Java
data.content: My true technology love. Lots to learn still with lambda's and Java 11 modularity.

data.title: Spring
data.content: Spring Boot all the way. Have you tried Spring Initializr?

data.title: Angular
data.content: I was surprised just how much I would love Microsoft products like Typescript and VS Code.

data.title: Docker
data.content: With Kubernetes and Docker I just don't know how we ever got to Production seamlessly.

data.title: Kubernetes
data.content: Simply an outstanding product. Still figuring out the PV's & PVC's.

data.title: Linux
data.content: Why some corporates do not allow Linux on developer laptops I will never understand. Forced to use Windows 10 currently. What a truly horrific daily experience.

data.title: Azure
data.content: Hmmm first step into Cloud. Been an incredible journey. Watch those costs!! Really impressed with Azure DevOps.

data.title: AWS
data.content: Currently investigating S3, EKS, IAM, API Gateway & Lambda's. Want to start comparisons with Azure.

data.title: Google
data.content: Too new to comment right now. Portal looks pretty cool.
